n_shot_prompts.prompt:
Q: Which process in the carbon cycle takes the longest to complete? (D)
Options:
(A). emission of waste.
(B). respiration in animals.
(C). photosynthesis in plants.
(D). formation of fossil fuels.
A: The process that takes the longest time to complete is the formation of fossil fuels, which happens over millions of years. So the answer is (D).

Q: Students studied the revolution of Earth around the Sun. During which month will Florida have the most sunlight energy available? (B)
Options:
(A). March.
(B). June.
(C). September.
(D). December
A: Florida is closer to the sun during June, so it will have the most sunlight energy during that month. So the answer is (B).

Q: George wants to warm his hands quickly by rubbing them. Which skin surface will produce the most heat? (A)
Options:
(A). dry palms.
(B). wet palms.
(C). palms covered with oil.
(D). palms covered with lotion.
A: Dry surfaces will more likely cause more friction via rubbing than other smoother surfaces, hence dry palms will produce the most heat. The answer is (A).

Q: Which factor will most likely cause a person to develop a fever? (B)
Options:
(A). a leg muscle relaxing after exercise.
(B). a bacterial population in the bloodstream.
(C). several viral particles on the skin.
(D). carbohydrates being digested in the stomach.
A: Option (b), bacterial population is the most likely cause for a person developing fever. The answer is (B).

Q: Which change in the state of water particles causes the particles to become arranged in a fixed position? (C)
Options:
(A). boiling.
(B). melting.
(C). freezing.
(D). evaporating.
A: When water is freezed, the particles are arranged in a fixed position; the particles are still moving for all other options. The answer is (C).

Q: When a switch is used in an electrical circuit, the switch can (D)
Options:
(A). cause the charge to build.
(B). increase and decrease the voltage.
(C). cause the current to change direction.
(D). stop and start the flow of current.
A: The function of a switch is to start and stop the flow of a current. The answer is (D).
